mapper.update: update qna set qna_title=#{qna_title}, qna_content=#{qna_content}, qna_img=#{qna_img} where qna_no=#{qna_no}
mapper.select: select q.qna_no, d.detail_no, q.qna_title, q.qna_date from qna q, customerOrder_detail d, customer_order o where q.detail_no=d.detail_no and o.order_no=d.order_no and o.cust_id=#{cust_id}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_no, detail_no, qna_title, qna_content, qna_img,qna_date, qna_answer) values(#{qna_no},#{detail_no},#{qna_title},#{qna_content},#{qna_img},sysdate,null)
